body: This fine watercolor is by a very well listed, sought after British artist, James Lobley. The symbolic composition “Remember the Poor” is typical of his religious genre scenes such as “Saying God be Merciful to Me a Sinner” and the “Interior of Hubberholme Church.” His works have been sold at venues such as Andrew Hartley Fine Arts, Phillip Leeds, Christies South Kensington, and Sotheby’s London (with his most recent sale of an oil painting at Sotheby’s London for $82,647).
artOnWallAltText: James Lobley Victorian Painting for Sale - Remember the Poor
dimensions: Watercolor, 12 x 8 inches / Signed lower left

title: Remember the Poor
